set hive.execution.engine=spark;
add jar viewfs:///path_to_the_jar/aaa.jar;
create temporary function func_name AS 'com.abc.ClassName';

select func_name(col_a) from table_name limit 100;{code}

fields.summary: Use UDFs in Hive-On-Spark complains Unable to find class Exception regarding kryo

comments.body:
It turns out to be a bug in hive-0.23 for not supporting viewfs scheme. It's summed up as below:
[http://jason4zhu.blogspot.hk/2018/04/hive-on-spark-unable-to-find-class.html]

Hey [~jason4z], thanks for reporting the this. The issue should have been fixed in HIVE-16292 and the fix version is 2.3.0. Which Hive version are you using? The code snippet in your blog post seems to be from an older version.
